articles.author: Patrick Ryan
articles.title: 'Strange Fruit': The history behind Billie Holiday's 'radioactive' protest song that inspired Hulu film - USA TODAY
articles.description: Get to know the story behind Billie Holiday's controversial "Strange Fruit," now the subject of Hulu biopic "The United States vs. Billie Holiday."
articles.content:
In March 1939, a then-23-year-old Billie Holiday closed out her set at New York's Cafe Society with a song she hadn't performed before: "Strange Fruit."

articles.title: Column: Genderless Potato Heads are no cause for panic - Yahoo News
articles.description: The growing acceptance of LGBTQ rights has put the moral arbiters of the right into a tizzy. Now they're attacking a hard-plastic toy.
articles.content:
In the new Potato Head world, gender is fluid. (Associated Press)
